data.text:
@deepities @ClareCraigPath This story is the best way to grab an idea of exponential growth...

As it shows, from week 1, in "roughly" 40 weeks (10 months) there would've been 1 BILLION people dead..

THE RICE AND THE CHESS BOARD STORY -   THE POWER OF EXPONENTIAL GROWTH
https://t.co/N4LhH5XwK4
@ClareCraigPath Erm it's shifted to Ukraine now. Do keep up. 😂

@RobinAdamsOsteo That is why the proposed WHO treaty is so terrifying.

Why can't we trust our elected representatives to do the right thing in a public health crisis? 

Why would we want an unelected central authority deciding that for us?

https://t.co/SSJitPneJa
@FireBloke89 @ClareCraigPath Acolytes being media and the public being the 'true believers'...
